Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+1. Inflict 1 Vulnerable.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend.

Actions.Name: Interrupt
Actions.Text: Reaction - Enemy within Range 1 moves. Strike+1 them.

Archetypes.Name: Swift
Archetypes.Strike: Deal 3 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Inflict 2 Weak and 2 Sundered.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Range 3 - all of targets attacks until your next turn or until you are defeated must include you as a target.

Archetypes.Name: Inspiring
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG-2} damage. An ally within Range 3 gains 1 Strength.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. An ally within Range 3 gains 1 Wary.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Each ally with Radius 3 gains 2 Haste and 2 Wary.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+1. Defend+1.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Radius 1 - Inflict 2 Slow. Defend.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend+4. Gain {TIR*3} Counter.

Actions.Name: Interrupt
Actions.Text: Reaction - An adjacent enemy moves. Strike them.

Archetypes.Name: Swift
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {TIR+1} damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Gain 1 Evasive.

Archetypes.Name: Spellproof
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. Choose an element. Gain resistance to that element until your next turn.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Consume up to {TIR} elements.

Passives.Name: Spellproof
Passives.Text: Attacks that have an element cannot ignore your Block.

Archetypes.Name: Impassible
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} Earth damage.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. Range 3 - target must attack you if able and can only move closer to you on their next turn.

Passives.Name: Attention drawing
Passives.Text: Zone of control +2.

Archetypes.Name: Coordinated
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG-3} damage. If the target is adjacent to your ally, that ally may Strike the target.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK-2} Block. An ally within Range 3 gains {BLK-2} Block.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Each ally within Radius 2 may Maneuver. Maneuver.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Defend. Strike. Inflict 1 Slow.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range 3 - Inflict {TIR} Slow and {TIR} Soft. Channel Nature.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend. Channel Water.

Actions.Name: Bodyguard
Actions.Text: Reaction - an adjacent ally is attacked. The Rabble swaps spaces with the ally and takes the attack.

Passives.Name: Group deployment
Passives.Text: {TIR+1} rabble are deployed as one unit, sharing activations but not spaces, statuses or health. When acting, they must all perform the same action.

Passives.Name: Natural powers
Passives.Text: At the end of turn, if Nature is channeled, Inflict {TIR+1} Soft. If Water is channeled, Push {TIR}

Passives.Name: Death so close
Passives.Text: Whenever a Rabble dies, all Rabble within Radius 3 gain 1 Vulnerable.

Archetypes.Name: Roused
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG+1} damage.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. You may Consume Water. If you do, Range +3. Strike-1. Inflict {TIR} Soft. Channel Nature.

Passives.Name: Death so close
Passives.Text: Whenever a Rabble dies, all Rabble within Radius 3 gain 2 Vulnerable, 2 Haste and 2 Strength.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend. Channel Light.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Defend. Strike. Consume Light. If you do, inflict {TIR+1} Feeble.

Archetypes.Name: Rife
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} damage

Passives.Name: Group deployment
Passives.Text: {TIR*2+1} rabble are deployed as one unit, sharing activations but not spaces, statuses or health. When acting, they must all perform the same action.

Archetypes.Name: Ravenous
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} Dark damage. You may consume Dark. If you do, gain half the damage dealt as barrier.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range 3 - Inflict {TIR} Weak and {TIR} Soft. Channel Dark.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Radius 1 - All friendly characters gain {BLK-3} Barrier. If they already have Barrier, they gain 2 extra.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend and gain {BLK-3} Barrier.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 5 - Place a Screamer.

Passives.Name: Ranged Suppresion
Passives.Text: Attacks against this and adjacent allies originating from Range 3 or greater deal half damage.

Passives.Name: Screamer
Passives.Text: Size 1 obstacle. Has {TIR+3} HP. At the end of each round, Radius 3 - inflict 1 Dazed.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Create a Size 1 obstacle adjacent to you. Defend. Channel Earth.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike. Defend. Consume Dark - Inflict {TIR+1} Bleed and target discards {TIR} cards.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 5 - Place a Screamer. Channel Dark.

Passives.Name: Screamer
Passives.Text: Size 1 obstacle. Has {TIR+3} HP and {TIR*3} barrier. At the end of each round, Radius 3 - inflict 1 Dazed.

Archetypes.Name: Plotting
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK-1} Block. Radius 3 - each ally may move 1.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Gain {DMG+2} Counter with Range 5.

Actions.Name: Bait
Actions.Text: Reaction - you are attacked by a non-adjacent enemy. Inflict 2 Dazed and 2 Feeble to them.

Archetypes.Name: Direct
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} Lightning damage.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Strike. Consume Lightning - Strike an enemy within Range 3 of the last target that hasn't been targetted with this action yet. Repeat {TIR} times.

Passives.Name: Charged Screms
Passives.Text: Whenever a Screamer is dealt damage, it deals {TIR} Damage to each enemy within Range 3.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver-2. Strike+1. Inflict {TIR+1} Bleed and gain {DMG} Counter.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1. Inflict {TIR+1} Bleed.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Defend.

Actions.Name: Riposte
Actions.Text: Reaction - You are attacked from any Range. Ignore all damage from dice showing 1 or 2. Deal damage equal to damage ignored back to the attacker.

Passives.Name: Duel
Passives.Text: The last character attacked by Duelist is dueling with it. Enemies dueling deal and take half damage from characters other than the one they are dueling. While the duelist is dueling, it resists all damage from characters it's not dueling.

Actions.Name: Riposte
Actions.Text: Reaction - You or an adjacent character is attacked from any Range. Ignore all damage from dice showing 1, 2 or 3. Deal damage equal to damage ignored back to the attacker.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1. Channel Earth.

Passives.Name: Steady as Stone
Passives.Text: Whenever you would be attacked or moved, you may consume Earth. If you do, gain {BLK} block and reduce the movement by {TIR*2}.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver-2. Strike+1. Gain {DMG} Counter. You may consume Lightning. If you do, Strike-2 and gain {DMG} Counter.

Archetypes.Name: Spellweaving
Archetypes.Strike: If there are three or more elements, consume a random element. Your attack deals that type of damage and deals an extra {TIR*2} damage. Deal {DMG} damage.
Archetypes.Maneuver: Move 3. Channel a random unchanneled element.

Passives.Name: Spellsnatch
Passives.Text: Whenever the character you are dueling channels an element, gain {BLK} barrier and deal {DMG-2} damage to them.

Name: Sentinel
Strike: Line {TIR+1}. Deal {DMG} Ice damage. Inflict {TIR+1} Slow.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Defend. Strike+2.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Channel Ice.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend. Channel Light.

Actions.Name: Protect
Actions.Text: Reaction - An enemy attacks you or an ally within Radius 3. Radius 3 - you and all allies gain {BLK-3} Block. You may consume Light and/or Ice. If Light is consumed, after this attack, inflict {TIR+1} Pulse on the attacker and they may only draw line of sight to adjacent spaces this turn. If Ice is consumed, Defend and inflict {TIR} Slow to the attacker.

Passives.Name: Sentry
Passives.Text: Zone of control +1.

Archetypes.Name: Royal
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK-2} Block. Radius 3 - each ally gains {TIR} Strength and {BLK-3} Barrier.

Passives.Name: In the presence of royalty
Passives.Text: Enemies within Range 5 deal {TIR*2} less damage to targets other than this chracter. Allies within Range 5 gain {TIR} less negative status effects.

Archetypes.Name: Indomitable
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK-2} Block. Reduce any status on you to 0.

Actions.Name: Deny
Actions.Text: Reaction - an ally within Range 5 gains a status. You may consume Light. If you do, reduce that status to 0.

Passives.Name: Unstoppable
Passives.Text: Ignores difficult terrain.

Archetypes.Name: Radiant
Archetypes.Strike: Radius {TIR+1}. Deal {DMG} Light damage. Inflict {TIR+1} Pulse.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Defend. Radius+2 - Strike+1.

Passives.Name: Bask in their light
Passives.Text: At the end of your turn, Radius 3 - each ally gains {BLK-2} Block. If Light is channeled, they gain that much Barrier instead.

Passives.Name: Shine On
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy attacks you, inflict {TIR} Pulse to them.

Archetypes.Name: Stormcaller
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR+2}. Deal {TIR+1} Lightning damage and inflict {TIR} Sundered {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. At the end of this round, Strike, replacing your Range with Radius. Channel Lightning.

Actions.Name: Protect
Actions.Text: Reaction - An enemy attacks you or an ally within Radius 3. Radius 3 - you and all allies gain {BLK-3} Block. You may consume Lightning and/or Ice. If Lightning is consumed, the attacked character gains {TIR*2} Counter. If Ice is consumed, Defend and inflict {TIR} Slow to the attacker.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Strike+1.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Range +{TIR+1}. Strike-1. Inflict {TIR} Slow.

Archetypes.Name: Rapid
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*2+3} - Deal {TIR+1} damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Range +{TIR+1}. Strike-1. Inflict {TIR} Bleed each hit.

Archetypes.Name: Sniper
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*3+3} - Deal {DMG} damage.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Range +{TIR+1}. Strike-1. Reactions cannot be used against this attack.

Archetypes.Name: Hunter
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*2+1} - Deal {DMG} Nature damage.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Range {TIR*3+1} - Inflict {TIR+1} Slow and {TIR} Poison. Target becomes Marked.

Actions.Name: Hunt
Actions.Text: Reaction - a Marked character ends their turn and hasn't moved. Strike+1 that character.

Passives.Name: Hunter's Mark
Passives.Text: Whenever a Marked character Maneuvers, target ally of the Hunter within line of sight of the Marked character may Maneuver.

Archetypes.Name: Scout
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*2+1} - Deal {DMG-2} Air damage and inflict {TIR+1} Soft.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. If there are no enemies within Range 5 of you, an ally within Range 5 may Maneuver.

Name: Caster
Strike: Range {TIR*2+1}. If there are three or more elements channeled, may consume one element. Otherwise, channel any element. The attack deals the consumed element's type of damage and gains an extra effect based on the element consumed. Fire, Lighting, Dark: +{TIR+1} damage. Air, Light, Water: +{TIR+1} Range. Ice, Earth, Nature: Gain {TIR+1} Block. Deal {DMG} damage. Ignore Block.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Burst 1. Strike+1.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range + {TIR+1}. Strike-1 up to two targets.

Archetypes.Name: Stormcaller
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*2+1}. If there are three or more elements channeled, may consume one element. Otherwise, channel any element. The attack deals the consumed element's type of damage and gains an extra effect based on the element consumed. Fire, Lighting, Dark: +{TIR+1} damage. Air, Light, Water: +{TIR+1} Range. Ice, Earth, Nature: Gain {TIR+1} Block. Deal {TIR+1} damage {TIR+1} times. Ignore Block.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 2 - Deal 1 damage. Channel Lightning.

Archetypes.Name: Combustionist
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR+1}. Burst {TIR}. If there are three or more elements channeled, may consume one element. Otherwise, channel any element. The attack deals the consumed element's type of damage and gains an extra effect based on the element consumed. Fire, Lighting, Dark: +{TIR+1} damage. Air, Light, Water: +{TIR+1} Range. Ice, Earth, Nature: Gain {TIR+1} Block. Deal {DMG} damage. Ignore Block.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Burst+1. Strike+1.

Archetypes.Name: Conductive
Archetypes.Defend: Channel any element. Gain barrier equal to the number of elements channeled.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend.

Archetypes.Name: Immortal
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*2+1}. If there are three or more elements channeled, may consume one element. Otherwise, channel any element. The attack deals the consumed element's type of damage and gains an extra effect based on the element consumed. Fire, Lighting, Dark: +{TIR+1} damage. Air, Light, Water: +{TIR+1} Range. Ice, Earth, Nature: Gain {TIR+1} Block. Deal {DMG-1} damage. Ignore Block. Gain Barrier equal to half the damage dealt.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. Consume any amount of elements - gain {TIR+1} block for each element consumed.

Actions.Name: Persist
Actions.Text: Reaction - you are attacked. Defend.

Name: Musketman
Strike: Range {TIR*2+8}. Spend 1 Ammo to deal {DMG+1} damage or Reload 1.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-2. Strike.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Choose a target in Range. At the start of your next turn, if the target is in Range, Strike them dealing double damage.

Passives.Name: Musket
Passives.Text: Starts combat with 1 Ammo and has 1 max Ammo.

Archetypes.Name: Sniper
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*3+8}. Spend 1 Ammo to deal {DMG+1} damage or Reload 1.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Range +{TIR*2+3}. Choose a target in Range. At the start of your next turn, if the target is in Range, Strike them dealing double damage. Reactions cannot be used against this attack.

Archetypes.Name: Lonesome
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK+1} Block. Reload 1. You may Consume Earth to create a size 1 Obstacle.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-2. Strike. If there are no characters within Range 5 of you, Reload 1.

Actions.Name: Eyes in the Back
Actions.Text: Reaction - you are attacked and no allies are within Range 5. Defend, then Strike the attacker, dealing half damage.

Passives.Name: Army of One
Passives.Text: If there are no allies, you deal {TIR*2} extra damage and Defend at the end of each of your turns.

Archetypes.Name: Reliable
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*3+8}. Spend 1 Ammo to deal {DMG+1} damage or Reload 1. Evasive halves the damage instead of reducing it to 1.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Range 3 - Target ally may Defend or Maneuver. Channel Air.

Archetypes.Name: Bruiser
Archetypes.Strike: Range {TIR*3+8}. Spend 1 Ammo to deal {DMG-1} damage or Reload 1 or deal {DMG-3} damage to an adjacent target.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Choose a target in Range. At the start of your next turn, if the target is in Range, Strike them dealing double damage. If they are adjacent, inflict {TIR} Vulnerable.

Passives.Name: Bloody strength
Passives.Text: As long as you're bloodied, deal +{TIR*2+1} damage to adjacent targets.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+2. Defend.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Strike. Channel Ice or Earth.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Range 3 - target gains {BLK} Block. You may consume Ice or Earth. If you do, create a size 1 Obstacle adjacent to the target.

Passives.Name: Death so close
Passives.Text: Whenever a Footman dies, all Footmen within Radius 3 gain 1 Vulnerable.

Passives.Name: Group deployment
Passives.Text: {TIR+1} footmen are deployed as one unit, sharing activations but not spaces, statuses or health. When acting, they must all perform the same action.

Archetypes.Name: Fearless
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. You may reduce a condition on an adjacent ally by 1.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+1. Defend.

Archetypes.Name: Ferocious
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG+TIR} damage. Gain 2 Soft.

Actions.Name: Melee.
Actions.Text: Maneuver-2. Strike+2. Defend.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Range 3 - target gains {DMG+TIR} Counter. You may consume Ice or Earth. If you do, create a size 1 Obstacle adjacent to the target.

Archetypes.Name: Fast
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {TIR} damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Range 3 - target gains {BLK} Block and may Move 1. You may consume Ice or Earth. If you do, create a size 1 Obstacle adjacent to the target.

Archetypes.Name: Fortunate
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} damage. The target exiles the top card of their deck. If a card with Strike is exiled this way, deal {DMG} damage.

Actions.Name: Missed by a Millimeter
Actions.Text: Reaction - you are dealt damage. Ignore all damage from dice showing 1. If there are more 1s than any other number on the dice rolled, ignore all damage and effects from the attack.

Passives.Name: Turn Away Fate
Passives.Text: When your health is reduced to 0, roll 1d6. On a 6, your health becomes 1 instead of you being defeated.

Name: Druid
Strike: Summon a Bramble. Deal {DMG-1} damage to each enemy adjacent to it.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 3 - Strike. Channel Nature or Water.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 6 - Strike. Inflict {TIR+1} Poison and {TIR} Slow to each enemy adjacent to the Bramble. You may consume Nature and/or Water. If Nature was consumed, inflict another {TIR+1} Poison. If Water was consumed, all spaces within Radius 2 of the Bramble become difficult terrain.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. You may move each Bramble in line of sight 1 space. They exert zone of control until your next turn.

Passives.Name: Bramble
Passives.Text: Size 1 obstacle. Has {TIR+3} HP. Has resistance against damage from non-adjacent sources. Has weakness against Fire and Lightning. Always has {TIR+2} Counter.

Passives.Name: Bramble tender
Passives.Text: Start of combat: place {TIR*2+1} Brambles within Range 7 of the Druid.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Manuever. Range 3 - Strike. You may destroy up to three Brambles. For each one destroyed, deal an additional {TIR} damage. Channel Dark

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 6 - Strike. Inflict {TIR+1} Poison to each enemy adjacent to the Bramble. You may Consume Dark and destroy two brambles to double the Poison on each of those enemies.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 6 - Summon a Bramle {TIR+1} times. Inflict {TIR} Poison and {TIR} Slow to each enemy adjacent to any of the summoned Brambles.

Archetypes.Name: Healer
Archetypes.Strike: Summon a Bramble. Restore {DMG-1} health to each ally adjacent to it.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 6 - Strike. Inflict {TIR} Slow to each enemy adjacent to the Bramble. You may consume Nature and/or Water. If Nature was consumed, each adjacent Ally recovers {DMG-1} Health. If Water was consumed, all spaces within Radius 2 of the Bramble become difficult terrain.

Archetypes.Name: Toxic
Archetypes.Strike: Summon a Bramble. Inflict {TIR+1} Poison to each enemy adjacent to it.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. You may move each Bramble in line of sight 1 space. Inflict {TIR} Poison to each enemy adjacent to a Bramble.

Passives.Name: Toxic Spikes
Passives.Text: Whenever a Bramble deals Counter damage to a character, it also Inflicts {TIR} Poison to that character.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+2. At the start of your next turn, if the target is adjacent to you and Bloodied, inflict 1 Wound.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 5 - target enemy Maneuvers to be as close as possible to you. If it becomes adjacent to you, inflict {TIR+1} Slow and Strike them.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend

Passives.Name: Large and Heavy
Passives.Text: Size 2. Reduce all push against the Statue by it's size.

Passives.Name: Chipping
Passives.Text: At the start of your turn, if you are bloodied, gain {TIR} Haste and {TIR*2} Soft.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike.

Passives.Name: Chipping
Passives.Text: At the start of your turn, if you are bloodied, gain {TIR} Slow and {TIR*2} Hard.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 7 - target enemy Maneuvers+2 to be as close as possible to you. If it becomes adjacent to you, inflict {TIR+1} Slow and Strike them.

Passives.Name: Pulling
Passives.Text: Zone of control +1. At the start of your turn, push each enemy within your zone of control to be adjacent to you.

Archetypes.Name: Radiant
Archetypes.Strike: Radius {TIR+1} - deal {DMG} Light damage.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+1. At the start of your next turn, if the target is within your Strike range and Bloodied, inflict 1 Wound.

Passives.Name: Shine On
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy attacks you, inflict {TIR} Pulse to them.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend. Radius 5 - each ally gains {TIR} Haste, then may maneuver as far as possible towards the enemy closest to them.

Passives.Name: Idol of Superiority
Passives.Text: Allies within Radius 3 deal receive {TIR} less of any negative statuses. Enemies within Radius 3 discard a card at the start of their turn.

Name: Hexer
Strike: Range 5. Target exiles 2 non-status cards from their hand. Inflict {DMG} Poison.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Create a three 1 HP Size 1 obstacles in three adjacent spaces.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Strike. Inflict 1 Stunned.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend.

Passives.Name: Auto-hex
Passives.Text: When attacked, the attacker exiles 1 non-status card from their hand.

Archetypes.Name: Poisoner
Archetypes.Strike: Range 5. Target exiles 1 non-status cards from their hand. Inflict {DMG+1} Poison.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Create a three 1 HP Size 1 obstacles in three adjacent spaces. When one of those obstacles is destroyed, Radius 1 from it - Inflict {TIR} Poison.

Passives.Name: Auto-hex
Passives.Text: When attacked, inflict {TIR} Poison to the attacker.

Archetypes.Name: Burner
Archetypes.Strike: Range 5. Target exiles 2 non-status cards from their hand. Consume Ice. If Ice wasn't consumed, inflict {DMG} Burn.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Strike. Inflict {DMG} Pulse.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Create a {TIR*5} HP Size 3 obstacle in an adjacent space.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Strike. Until end of their next turn, target may only draw line of sight to spaces within Range X, where X is the number of cards in their hand.

Archetypes.Name: Wildling
Archetypes.Strike: Radius 3 - each enemy exiles 2 non-status cards from their hand. Inflict {DMG} Poison.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Radius 2 - all terrain becomes difficult terrain. Maneuver.

Passives.Name: Unstoppable
Passives.Text: Ignores difficult terrain.

Passives.Name: Auto-hex
Passives.Text: When attacked, the attacker exiles 1 non-status card from their hand. You gain Block equal to {TIR+1} times the cost of that card.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Place a Sapping Pillar.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Place a Chaining Pillar next to the target.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 5 - Place 3 size 1 obstacles.

Passives.Name: Wall Infusion
Passives.Text: All obstacles within Range 3 of the Inhibitor take {TIR*2+1} less damage.

Passives.Name: Pillar
Passives.Text: All Pillars are Size 1 obstacles. They can be attacked and have {TIR*5+5} HP.

Passives.Name: Sapping Pillar
Passives.Text: Radius 3 - All enemies deal {TIR*2+1} less damage.

Passives.Name: Chaining Pillar
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy starts their turn adjacent to the Chaining Pillar, that turn they may not move to be further than 3 spaces away from that Chaining Pillar unless it is destroyed.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Place a Damping Pillar next to the target.

Passives.Name: Damping Pillar
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy within range 5 channels an element, they gain {TIR} Feeble and {TIR} Slow. Whenever an enemy within range 5 consumes an element, deal {DMG} damage to them.

Archetypes.Name: Captivating
Archetypes.Strike: Range 5 - Deal {DMG+1} Dark damage. Push {TIR} towards the closest pillar.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Place a Captivating Pillar.

Passives.Name: Captivating Pillar
Passives.Text: Enemies within line of sight can't attack targets that are farther away from them than Captivating Pillar.

Archetypes.Name: Erecting
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK+1} Block. Create a Size 1 Obstacle.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 5 - Place {TIR*3+3} size 1 Obstacles. Then, inflict {TIR} Weak and {TIR} Soft to each enemy adjacent to an obstacle placed this way.

Archetypes.Name: Draining
Archetypes.Strike: Range 5 - Deal {DMG+1} Ice damage. Reduce up to one status on the target by {TIR}.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Place a Draining Pillar.

Passives.Name: Draining Pillar
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy starts their turn adjacent to the Draining Pillar, reduce all of their positive statuses by {TIR}.

Name: Mindmister
Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. When your block is broken, inflict {DMG} Dazed to the character breaking it.

Actions.Name: One
Actions.Text: Strike. Target shuffles their hand and discard into their deck, then draws that many cards. Maneuver-1.

Actions.Name: Many
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 3 - Strike and Push 2.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Range+4 - Strike-1 and inflict {DMG} Slow.

Passives.Name: Mist of Mind
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy ends their turn within Range 5 of Mindmister, inflict {TIR} Dazed.

Passives.Name: Pain of Clarity
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy within Range 5 plays Dazed, they lose {DMG} life.

Passives.Name: Last Breath
Passives.Text: When defeated, perform the One action.

Archetypes.Name: Swift
Archetypes.Strike: Deal 3 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Inflict 2 Weak and 2 Sundered.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Range 3 - all of targets attacks until your next turn or until you are defeated must include you as a target.

Archetypes.Name: Inspiring
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG-2} damage. An ally within Range 3 gains 1 Strength.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. And ally within Range 3 gains 1 Wary.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Each ally with Radius 3 gains 2 Haste and 2 Wary.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Strike+1. Target becomes Marked.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 5 - Target ally Maneuvers and Strikes.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. All allies within Radius 3 may Move 3.

Passives.Name: Gun
Passives.Text: All attacks may gain Range {3+TIR*2}. If they do, they cost 1 Ammo and they deal +2 damage. Starts combat with 3 Ammo and max Ammo 3.

Passives.Name: Officer's Mark
Passives.Text: Marked characters take {TIR+1} extra damage.

Archetypes.Name: Banneret
Archetypes.Strike: Line 2. Deal {DMG} damage.

Passives.Name: Banner
Passives.Text: Allies within Radius 3 deal {TIR+1} more damage and take {TIR+1} less damage.

Passives.Name: Legacy
Passives.Text: When Officer is defeated, place a Size 1 obstacle in its space. It has all the effects of Banner.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Range 5 - Target ally loses {TIR*2} life, gains 2 Strength and 1 Haste, Maneuvers and Strikes.

Passives.Name: Cursed Bullets
Passives.Text: Attacks consuming ammo inflict 2 Dazed and 2 Sundered.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. All allies within Radius 3 may Move 3 and gain {TIR*4} Barrier.

Actions.Name: Protect our own
Actions.Text: Reaction - an ally within Range 3 is attacked. That ally gains {TIR*4} Block and you may Strike the attacker.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range 3 - mark target. For each marked enemy, an ally may strike that enemy.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 3 - each ally may Move 2 and Strike an Obstacle.

Name: Arcanist
Strike: Range 5 - deal {DMG-1} damage. If the target is inside a Circle, deal that damage {TIR} more times.

Actions.Name: Bind
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Deploy a Binding Circle.

Actions.Name: Embolbolden
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Deploy an Emboldening Circle.

Actions.Name: Invigorate
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Deploy an Invigorating Circle.

Passives.Name: Circles
Passives.Text: All Circles are Radius 3 terrain. They can be attacked and have {TIR*5+5} HP. When you deploy a Circle, choose your space or an adjacent space. That is the center of the Circle.

Passives.Name: Binding Circle
Passives.Text: At the start of their turn, inflict {TIR} Slowed and deal {DMG} damage to each enemy within this Circle.

Passives.Name: Emboldening Circle
Passives.Text: At the start of their turn, each ally within this Circle gains {TIR+2} Strength for that turn and {BLK} Block.

Passives.Name: Invigorating Circle
Passives.Text: At the start of their turn, each ally within this Circle gains {TIR+2} Haste for that turn and recovers {TIR*3} HP.

Actions.Name: Explosive Dismissal
Actions.Text: Chose any Circle, regardless of range or line of sight - Strike+2 each enemy inside that circle and inflict 1 Stunned. Destroy that Circle.

Actions.Name: Restoring Dismissal
Actions.Text: Chose any Circle, regardless of range or line of sight - Each ally inside the circle recovers {TIR*6} HP. Destroy that Circle.

Passives.Name: Imbuement
Passives.Text: Whenever you deploy a circle, if it overlaps perfectly with another circle, increase all numberic values in both circles by {TIR}.

Actions.Name: Fight
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike.

Passives.Name: Grow
Passives.Text: At the start of your turn, gain {TIR} Hard if you have any Binding Circles. Do the same for Emboldening and {TIR} Strength, and Invigorating and {TIR} Haste.

Actions.Name: Dazzling Circle
Actions.Text: At the start of their turn, each enemy within this Circle gains gains {TIR} Dazed and discards a non-status card.

Passives.Name: Binding
Passives.Text: Enemies cannot move out of Circles.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Channel Fire or Ice. Inflict {TIR+1} Poison and {TIR+1} Strength.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range 5 - Target character gains {BLK-1} Block, {TIR+1} Strength and {TIR+1} Bleed.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Consume Fire and/or Ice. Burst 3 - Strike-1 dealing damage of one of the consumed element's type. If Fire was consumed, inflict {TIR+1} Burn to each enemy. If Ice was consumed, each ally gains {BLK-1} Block.

Passives.Name: Blood scream
Passives.Text: When you become bloodied for the first time, Channel Fire or Ice and inflict {TIR} Dazed to each enemy within line of sight.

Archetypes.Name: Binder
Archetypes.Strike: Range 5 - Deal {DMG} damage. You may replace a status on the target with Slow.

Actions.Name: Bind
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Channel Fire or Ice. Strike.

Passives.Name: Bound Imp
Passives.Text: Start of combat: Deploy an Imp within Range 3 of you. It has {TIR*5+5} HP and at the end of each of your turns moves 3, then Range 3 - Deal {DMG} damage and inflict {TIR} Strength and {TIR} Poison. It ignores difficult terrain.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Defend. Radius 3 - Inflict {TIR+1} Strength and {TIR+1} Bleed to each other character.

Actions.Name: My blood freezes
Actions.Text: Reaction - you are attacked. You may consume Ice. If you do, Defend.

Passives.Name: Scars that protect
Passives.Text: Whenever you lose health from an attack, gain {TIR} Sturdy.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range 5 - Target character gains {TIR+1} Strength and {TIR+1} Bleed. Then, if it is an enemy, they may either lose {TIR+1} Strength and gain {TIR} Weak or Maneuver and Strike, with you controlling the action.

Passives.Name: Too lovely to harm
Passives.Text: Whenever you are attacked, the attacker chooses to either gain {TIR} Feeble or lose {TIR*2} health.

Archetypes.Name: Host
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} damage and inflict {TIR} Bleed.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Channel Fire or Ice. Defend. Strike.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. You may consume Fire. If you do, Strike, inflicting Burn instead of Bleed. You may consume Ice. If you do, Strike, inflicting Slow instead of Bleed.

Passives.Name: Breach containment
Passives.Text: When defeated for the first time, if you were not defeated by Light damage, any enemy may receive a Wound. If none does, restore your health to full and perfom the Far action. You gain Flying for the rest of combat.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend+1.

Actions.Name: Dance
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. An ally may perform an action.

Actions.Name: Perform
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend. Radius {TIR+2} - Each ally gains {TIR+1} Haste.

Passives.Name: Retaliation
Passives.Text: After being attacked, any ally within line of sight may Strike the attacker if able.

Archetypes.Name: Blade
Archetypes.Strike: Deal 2 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Mobility
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend+1. Strike.

Passives.Name: Retaliation
Passives.Text: After being attacked, you may move 1, then Strike the attacker if able.

Actions.Name: Dance
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Radius {TIR} - each ally that has already activated this turn may activate again.

Archetypes.Name: Tempest
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} Air damage. The target discards a card at random, then draws a card.
Archetypes.Maneuver: Move 3. You may consume Air to Teleport 3 instead.

Actions.Name: Dance
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. An ally may perform an action. At the end of that action, Push {TIR} that ally.

Actions.Name: Perform
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Channel Air. Radius {TIR*2+3} - Each other character gains {TIR+1} Haste. Strike.

Archetypes.Name: Incensed
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} Fire damage.

Actions.Name: Perform
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend. Radius {TIR+2} - Each ally gains {TIR+1} Strength.

Passives.Name: Things are heating up!
Passives.Text: Adjacent allies deal X more damage, where X is your Strength.

Name: Illuminator
Strike: Range 3 - Deal {DMG} Light damage. Inflict {TIR+1} Pulse.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+1. Maneuver. Channel Light.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 3 - Allies gain {TIR+2} Barrier. Inflict {TIR+2} Pulse. Enemies may not draw line of sight further than their Pulse value until the end of their turn.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Teleport to be adjacent to an ally. That ally gains {BLK+1} Block. You may consume Light. If you do, Radius 5 - inflict {DMG+1} Pulse.

Passives.Name: Illumination
Passives.Text: Allies may draw line of sight, but not Range, from you.

Archetypes.Name: Scorching
Archetypes.Strike: Range 3 - Deal {DMG} Fire damage. Inflict {TIR+1} Burn.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 3 - Allies gain {TIR+2} Barrier. Strike each enemy. Channel Fire.

Passives.Name: Burn through me
Passives.Text: Whenever an ally Strikes an enemy within Range 5 of you, inflict 1 Burn to that enemy.

Passives.Name: Petering out
Passives.Text: When you become bloodied for the first time, each enemy within line of sight may exile up to {TIR+1} cards from their hand.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Teleport to be adjacent to an ally. That ally gains {BLK+1} Block. You may consume Light. If you do, that ally gains {TIR} Powerful.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 3 - Allies gain {TIR+2} Barrier. Then Range 5 - Inflict {TIR+2} Pulse and that enemy may not draw line of sight further than their Pulse value until the end of their turn.

Actions.Name: Ward
Actions.Text: Reaction - an ally within Range 3 is attacked. That ally gains {TIR*3} Barrier. Channel Light.

Passives.Name: Sheltering Light
Passives.Text: At the start of your turn you may consume Light. If you do, Radius 3 - each ally gains {TIR*3} Barrier.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike. Choose and adjacent ally. Maneuver, then teleport the chosen ally to be adjacent to you.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Radius 3 - Inflict {TIR+2} Pulse. Enemies may not draw line of sight further than their Pulse value until the end of their turn. Channel Light.

Actions.Name: Escape
Actions.Text: Reaction - you are attacked. You may consume Light. If you do, Maneuver. If you are can no longer be targeted by the attack, ignore all of it's effects.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+1. Exile a random card from the target's hand, deck and discard.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 2 - Strike. Exile a random card from the target's hand.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Defend

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 2 - Strike. Exile a random card from the target's hand. If you are not examined, exile the top two cards of their deck.

Passives.Name: Unseen
Passives.Text: If you are not examined, you cannot take more than 1 damage from attacks.'

Archetypes.Name: Daring
Archetypes.Strike: Move 1. Deal {DMG} damage. Inflict {DMG-1} Bleed.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+1. The target may exile two random cards from their hand, deck and discard each. If they don't, Strike+1.

Actions.Name: Offensive Parry
Actions.Text: Reaction - you are attacked. Maneuver towards the attacker, then Strike them.

Archetypes.Name: Sacrilegious
Archetypes.Maneuver: Move {3+TIR}. Ignore zone of control. You may consume any element.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Range 2 - Strike. Exile a random card from the target's hand. If there are no elements channeled, Burst 2 centered on the target - inflict {TIR+1} Bleed.

Passives.Name: Divinity Denied
Passives.Text: As long as no elements are channeled, you have resistance to all damage.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Defend. Until your next turn, whenever you are attacked, you may move 1 after the attack.

Passives.Name: Prepared
Passives.Text: At the start of combat, Defend.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike. Maneuver.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Range 3 - Strike-2. Inflict {TIR*2} Poison.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+1. Defend.

Passives.Name: Elusive
Passives.Text: At the start of your turn and at the start of combat, gain 1 Evasive.

Passives.Name: Pick off
Passives.Text: When attacking enemies that have no allies within Range 3, deal double damage.

Archetypes.Name: Swift
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {TIR+1} damage {TIR+1} times.

Archetypes.Name: Determined
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG+2} damage.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver.

Passives.Name: Finish the job
Passives.Text: Reaction - you are defeated. Range 3 - Strike-4. Inflict {TIR*2} Poison.

Archetypes.Name: Phantom
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} Air damage. Consume Air - inflict {TIR+1} Bleed.

Actions.Name: Like the shadows
Actions.Text: Reaction - you are attacked. Consume Dark - Teleport 3. Ignore all efects of the triggering attack.

Passives.Name: Unseen
Passives.Text: If you are not not examined, your Strike gains 'Inflict 1 Slow and 1 Stunned.'

Archetypes.Name: Patient
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG-3} damage. Inflict {TIR+1} Poison.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. And ally within Range 3 gains 1 Wary.

Passives.Name: The long fight
Passives.Text: Whenever your evasive is triggered, inflict {TIR} Poison to the attacker.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike+1. Inflict 3 Slow. Maneuver.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Strike-1. Deal 1 extra damage and Inflict 1 Dazed for every 2 spaces moved in a straight line.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver-1. Gain 2 Haste and 2 Strength for next turn only.

Archetypes.Name: Swift
Archetypes.Strike: Deal 3 damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Inflict 2 Weak and 2 Sundered.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Defend. Range 3 - all of targets attacks until your next turn or until you are defeated must include you as a target.

Archetypes.Name: Inspiring
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG-2} damage. An ally within Range 3 gains 1 Strength.
Archetypes.Defend: Gain {BLK} Block. And ally within Range 3 gains 1 Wary.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Each ally with Radius 3 gains 2 Haste and 2 Wary.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Line+{TIR+1}. Strike+1. Move to the end of the line. Channel Air.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1 dealing Light damage instead. You may consume Air or Light. If Air was consumed, choose an enemy within Range 3 of the target and deal {DMG-1} Air damage. Then move to any space within Range 2 of the second target. If Light was consumed, you and an ally within Range 2 gain {BLK} Barrier and reduce any number of conditions on both of you by {TIR+1}.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Channel Light. Defend.

Passives.Name: Carry the Warriors
Passives.Text: Whenever an ally with Range 5 is defeated, gain 1 Haste, 1 Strength and channel Light.

Archetypes.Name: Swift
Archetypes.Strike: Deal 2 Air damage {TIR+1} times.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Line+{TIR+1}. Strike. Move to the end of the line. Channel Air.

Archetypes.Name: Radiant
Archetypes.Strike: Line 3. Deal {DMG} Light damage.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Channel Light. Defend. Radius 5 - Inflict {TIR+2} Pulse.

Passives.Name: Shine On
Passives.Text: Whenever an enemy attacks you, inflict {TIR} Pulse to them.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1 dealing Light damage instead. If you aren't bloodied, you may consume Air. If you do, Maneuver, then Radius 3 - Strike and push 1 all enemies away. If you are bloodied, you may consume Light. If you do, choose any ally regardless of range or line of sight - that ally gains Barrier equal to your health, {TIR+2} Strength and {TIR+2} Hard and you are defeated.

Passives.Name: Winged
Passives.Text: You have Flying.

Archetypes.Name: Furious
Archetypes.Strike: Line 2. Deal {DMG} Fire damage. Gain 1 Strength.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Line+{TIR+1}. Strike+1. Move to the end of the line. Channel Fire.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike-1. You may consume Fire. If you do, Burst 3 at the end of the line - Strike-1 and inflict {TIR+1} Pulse.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Channel Fire. Defend.

Actions.Name: Melee
Actions.Text: Strike. Defend. You may consume Light and/or Dark: If Light was consumed, deal {DMG} Light damage and the target can only draw line of sight to adjacent spaces next turn. If Dark was consumed, deal {DMG} Dark damage and the target discards {TIR} cards.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Channel Light or Dark.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Defend. Gain {TIR*2+2} Counter with Range 6.

Actions.Name: Deflect
Actions.Text: Reaction - You are attacked by a non adjacent enemy. Gain {TIR} Evasive and deal {DMG} damage to the attacker.

Passives.Name: Harmony
Passives.Text: If neither Light or Dark is channeled, you have resistance to all damage with an element. If both Light and Dark are channeled, you deal {TIR} extra damage and take {TIR*3} less damage.

Archetypes.Name: Disabling
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} damage twice. Inflict 1 Feeble.

Actions.Name: Close
Actions.Text: Maneuver. Strike. Choose Strike, Defend or Maneuver. Until the end of their next turn, when the target performs that action, they discard a card and lose {TIR} life. Channel Light or Dark.

Actions.Name: Far
Actions.Text: Maneuver+2. Defend. Gain {TIR*3+2} Counter with Range 6.

Passives.Name: Untouchable
Passives.Text: Whenver you are attacked by a non adjacent enemy gain {TIR} Evasive and deal {DMG} damage to the attacker.

Archetypes.Name: Mindful
Archetypes.Strike: Deal {DMG} damage twice and gain {TIR+1} Haste.
